overview:
I graduated from Faculty of Commerce, Cairo University in 1995 with Bachelors in Business Administration.

Upon my graduation I joined team Link.Net (known as Link Egypt back in 1997) and took part in its start up. I must say that it is a pride to have taken part in establishing the biggest private ISP company in the Middle East today, part of The Orascom Telecom Group. I was handling the ISP connectivity division, managing a team of 45 people across Egypt when I was nominated among a team of three in 2001 to relocate in Dubai to establish the sister company MSN Arabia.

I was promoted as the Regional Sales Manager for MSN Arabia, Hotmail & MSN Messenger. Introducing the on-line era to the advertising and marketing world in the GCC, our nuclear team increased the portalâ€™s sales from 34% in 2001 up to 114% in 2004 by setting the targets higher and higher and striving to achieve them.

After a long career within the digital media field, I gladly joined the start-up team of I-Gency, which was the first interactive media buying company in Dubai founded in June 2005. I took over the same tasks I was managing with the MSN Network, however, on a larger scale. Utilizing my extensive client database and peopleâ€™s networking I contributed to making I-Gency become the primary interactive agency in the Arab World.
In Early 2007, I-Gency was acquired by MindShare group (part of the global company Group M) to form MindShare Interaction and become the digital arm of the whole group of companies in the GCC (MindShare, Media Insight, Media Edge, RMG Connect & JWT). Moving forward, I was offered to pursue my career in digital communication on a more specialized and unique platform, an offer I could not turn down. I joined Suomi (another word for Finland in Finish) specialized in mobile connectivity marketing and advertising. The business idea is based on the Nokia Interactive Platform being the exclusive representatives and retailer of advertising on the worldâ€™s leading Nokia handsets platform in the region. Having a diversified experience in the digital media business allowed to easily introduce this new innovative medium across all multinational clients within the region with great success.

Established â€œIKOO Advertising Networkâ€ office in Egypt as country manager. IKOO is one subsidiary of another 9 ventures which falls under Jabbar Internet Group, being the founders of Maktoob.com in 1997. Establishing their office in Egypt, building up the team and working very closely with media as well digital agencies in Egypt, direct clients, etcâ€¦
